ComicInfo.Summary: Doc Savage tests a universal quantum machine (UQM) that accidentally sends a jetliner full of passengers into the past, so he follows them back to 1939. There, industrialist Richard Henry Benson is traveling to Nepal with his family and the Voodoo Master is plotting against Benson and the Shadow.

ComicInfo.Title: The Time Machine!
